entry.title: 基础语法part one 简单句
entry.content:
part one 简单句

1五大基本句型

1.主语+谓语

The sun rises.

The snow melts.

2.主语+谓语(vt)+宾语

I love you.

He needs some help.

3.主语+谓语+间接宾语+直接宾语

I sent Mary a book.

He gave me a bar chocolate for Chrismas.

4.主语+谓语+宾语+宾补

He makes his little sister happy.

They make many banking services available as well.(1994年text2)

5.主语+系动词+表语

be动词

He is a teacher.

It is an interesting book.

感官动词：

look、seem、appear、sound、tasks、smell、feel

He seems very sad.

Thus flower smells quite fragrant.

变：

become、turn、go、get、come、run、fall、grow

Darkness falls early in the winter.

持续性动词：

keep、rest、remain、stay、lie、stand

The prospect seems remote.

2.名词性短语结构

1. n.1 of n.2 结构

He function is analogous to that of a judge,who must accept the obligation of revealing in as obvious a matter as possible the course of reasoning which led him to his decision.

2. n.1 of n.2 of n3

1.The coming of age of the postwar baby boom and an entry of women into the male-dominated job market have limited the opportunities of teenagers who are already questioning the heavy personal sacrifices involved in climbing Japan’s rigid social ladder to good shcools and jobs.

2.China is proud of its five thousand years of history and culture.

3.Pearson has pieced together the work of hundreds of researchers around the world to produce a unique millennium technology calendar that gives the latest dates when we can expect hundreds of key breakthroughs and discoveries to take place.

3. n.1 of n.2 and n.3 n.4

But the idea that the journalist must understand the law more profoundly than an ordinary citizen rests on an understanding of the established conventions and special responsibilities of the news media.

4. n.1 of n.2 of n.3 of n.4

The method of scientific investigation is nothing but the expression of the necessary mode of working of the human mind;it is simply the mode by which all phenomena are reasoned about and given precise and exact explanation.

entry.title: 12年之前的高数题型 函数 极限 连续
entry.content:
函数 极限 连续

概念：

定义、性质

有界无界

俩个准则

无穷小比较

计算：

方法：

1.等价、2.泰勒、3.洛必达、4.抓大头、5.拉格朗

0/0 无穷比无穷

方法：首选洛，然后等价与泰勒

∞-∞

（方法：抓大头、分子有理化、通分）

0*∞

1^∞

方法：(只限制1的无穷次方)
$$
f(x)^{g(x)} 、f(x) -> 1 、g(x)->∞ 、ln(f(x)-1+1)等价f(x)-1
$$
$$
f(x)^{g(x)} = e^{g(x)*[f(x)-1]}
$$

∞^0

已知极限反求参数

方法：首选等价次之泰勒

连续

考点:
$$
f(x0^-)=f(x0^+)=f(x0)
$$

间断
entry.summary: <font color=red> <center>函数 极限 连续</center> </font>

entry.title: hexo+GitHub搭建网站
entry.content:

一路安装下去就可以了，安装完成之后去cmd控制台查看一下node -v 以及 npm -v查看一下是否安装成功

GitHub注册

Git安装到win

GitHubSHH匹配

hexo本地使用

hexo发布到GitHub

hexo主题next使用

entry.title: JSP考试
entry.content:
JSP五个对象与导入js脚本与css样式的方法

JSP五个对象

对象真实类型功能
requestHttpServletRequests一次请求访问的多个资源
responseHttpServletResponse响应对象
sessionHttpSession一次会话的多个请求
outJspWriter输出对象，输出数据到页面上
pageObject当前页面的对象，类似于java中的this指针

导入js脚本与css样式进入jsp页面方法

  1. 导入js脚本
    -通过标签<script<插入js文件
    -直接在<script type=”text/javascript”></script>标签中写入js代码
  2. 导入css样式
    -外部样式：每个页面使用<link>标签链接到样式表
    -内部样式：使用<style>标签在文档头部定义内部样式表
    -内联样式: 在相关的标签内使用样式(style)属性。style属性可包含css属性
entry.summary: <font color=red> <center>JSP五个对象与导入js脚本与css样式的方法</center> </font>
